title: Bexhill
name: Bexhill Museum
address: Egerton Road, Bexhill On Sea, East Sussex TN39 3HL
hours: Opening Times Tues-Fri 10AM-5PM, Sat-Mon and Bank Holidays 11AM-5PM
price: Admission £3 for adult, £1.50 for children 5-16, free admission for under 5s
content: This museum covers all aspects of modern life: from the history of wildlife in one section, fashion in another, and automobiles all in one small museum. Bexhill museum is perfect for both family visits and educational visits.
